mapper.insert: insert into bookstore (title, writer, publisher, publicationDate, price, comment, underline, notes, cover, writingName, discoloration, damage) values (#{title} , #{writer} , #{publisher}, #{publicationDate}, #{price}, #{comment}, #{underline}, #{notes}, #{cover}, #{writingName}, #{discoloration}, #{damage})
mapper.select: select * from bookstore order by seq desc
